website_summaries.verdict: A pen-style lip stain by a popular brand in makeup. This unique product works well for many consumers, but some may not like how it looks or feels on the lips.
pros: This water-based lip stain comes in a pen that makes it easy to apply
Very sheer, and can be paired with other lip products
Dries almost instantly when applied, and can be applied in layers for more intense color
cons: Somewhat drying on the lips, plus the product tends to dry out fairly quickly in the tube
Mixed opinions on the shades – some wearers love them, others say they are either too light or too dark

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Sheer Pink Lipstain
customer_reviews.text: It's a very pretty pink color, but not a "au natural" kind of pink. It will definitely make your lips look like you have a sheer pink lipstick on. The color fades a bit after a few hours, especially if you're eating or drinking (like sipping coffee at your desk all morning, for instance) and you'll need to reapply, but I think it's not a big deal since these marker-type stains don't usually last all day. I usually top with my favorite chapstick and am good to go.
customer_reviews.author: L. Spare

customer_reviews.title: More of a gloss than lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I have tried using some of the long lasting lipsticks, however they dry out my lips so badly I cannot where lipstick again for a week. This product is gentle and more of a gloss. I'm ok with applying periodically. I'm not that fussy. Sometimes just applying for photos.
customer_reviews.author: CAHuss

customer_reviews.title: Stays on throughout the day.
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a base under my lipstick as my lipstick tends to wear off during the day. With this my lips still have color even after my lipstick wears off. Most people think I'm still wearing lipstick and are amazed by how it stays on even after wiping my mouth after eating.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Long

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't actually last super long on me especially after eating
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't actually last super long on me especially after eating. But it gives me what I need for most of the day- to look like I'm alive and that I'm not a sickly, anemic dead girl. Tastes kinda nice but not a fan of the sticky feeling right after. Would be happier with a slightly more natural shade of pink, but it actually did come out as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy9

customer_reviews.title: Great Lipstain product.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only lip covering that I use. I hate that Covergirl has discontinued this Lipstain product. Covergirl's current lip gloss variation is too heavy and uncomfortable on my lips
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: No bleeding into fine lines, doesn't dry out lips and the 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish they still sold this product in stores. No bleeding into fine lines, doesn't dry out lips and the 2 colors I use are accurate when applied. I feel the need to buy up all of them in case it no longer can be purchased anywhere. HA!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best lip color product forme
customer_reviews.text: This it the best product for me. The color lasts and it is not drying.
customer_reviews.author: gardener

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many many outlast lip stains. Both of these (package of 2) were all dried out. That is the fault of the seller, not the product. Wasted my money. I see I am not the only person with the same complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Pm

customer_reviews.title: Just not pleased with the color
customer_reviews.text: Lip stains are usually drying, which is why I ordered a stick gloss along with it. Just not pleased with the color. Not a fan of light pink.
customer_reviews.author: VJErwood

customer_reviews.title: It seems like most of the reviewers liked this product but for ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading the other reviews on this product I was excited to try it. It seems like most of the reviewers liked this product but for me that was not the case. This was truly a waste of money. When I put it on my lips looked bright orange like a clown. Not a good look.
customer_reviews.author: Trailer Park Teresa

customer_reviews.title: CoverGirl Outlast Lipstain Everbloom Kiss
customer_reviews.text: This color along with the Saucy Plum are my two favorite lipstains. And I have tried lots. They just look so natural and not like you drank Koolaid. You can layer them for a darker color or put other lipsticks over them. They are versatile and I really love that you can use them to wake up with color still on your lips too.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great product, good color.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Everbloom kiss is a bit less candy pink than the tube, a rich rose.
customer_reviews.author: Chena

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have sensitivities to wearing lipsticks or lipstains
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of allergies to different make up products but with this one I have no allergies to it. I have very sensitive skin. The only draw back is that you have to apply it frequently. I am just glad I can wear it to give me a nice tint to my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Cortes

customer_reviews.title: This color was great, and it never flakes
customer_reviews.text: This lasts much longer than regular lipstick or gloss. I have had stains that last most of the day, but they end up flaky. This color was great, and it never flakes. It does fade a bit, but still holds color, and I only reapplied once at work.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Not for African Queens
customer_reviews.text: I am dark complexioned and it did not show up well for me; neither did it last more than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Shelle

customer_reviews.title: It lasts and has a strange but good taste to it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this stuff for as long as I can remember! It lasts and has a strange but good taste to it. They recently stopped selling this product at Target and I don't know where to find it anymore! Overall in love but hate how they seem to dry out pretty quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: but it did taste great!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. It was a little lighter than it looks and it didn't stay stained very long, but it did taste great!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Less staying power than store bought
customer_reviews.text: I use this product regularly but was unable to find this color in store so Amazon it was! The color is nice however these lip stains generally show up a shade lighter than what you would anticipate. I'm not sure why but this lip stain goes on much more watery than those I have purchased in store and the stain does not last all day while the store bought ones do. I have no explanation for this but it's an ok purchase if you don't mind reapplying.
customer_reviews.author: AButtke

customer_reviews.title: Slightly brighter then wanted but it looks great and lasts a decent amount of time
customer_reviews.text: Slightly brighter then wanted but it looks great and lasts a decent amount of time. It also came super early which I love!
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Lasts all day!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstain. You put it on in the morning at it lasts all day. In the middle of my day I put on a touch of gloss and it looks great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zebra Girl

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It reminds me of that just eaten a Popsicle look! It truly is a stain and doesn't look like you are wearing any lip product at all. It also layers nicely with gloss if you choose .
customer_reviews.author: carly gjesvold

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!!! Considering I ended up spending £8 on it & ordered it from America to England, it really was worth it! It smells really sweet & tastes really sweet so I love it. The colour can be built on too, the more layers you put on, the brighter the colour. The only thing I could say is a flaw, is that it's supposed to be a lip stain, and although it does stay, it doesn't last long... I had to reapply a few times a day to maintain the colour. Overall, it's a handbag staple, the colour is gorgeous & it's a definite must have. Buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Ambler

customer_reviews.title: If you like a natural, yet intensified, lip color, this is it
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this color over all other pinks that I have tried - I do not like a bright lipstick or stain, however. This stain produces a natural looking lip colr - just intensified. Does not dry out lips as does other brands I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: CK WOOD

customer_reviews.title: Love CoverGirl lip stains
customer_reviews.text: And much prefer them to “lipstick”. It lasts longer and stays on my lips until after noon. I do supplement it with lip moisturizer, but that’s just me because I like moist lips. Great color and coverage. I wish it could still be found in the corner drugstore.
customer_reviews.author: Juleinny

customer_reviews.title: Eh....
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it was just the item I received or if it an actual flaw - but these do not last very long. The colors are pretty but for the cost it is not really an item I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Abel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT lip stain
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstain! There are lots of colors to choose from and it lasts quite a while - much better than lipstick. I have had troubles finding it in stores and am happy to find it online!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Gross

customer_reviews.title: love this lip stain!
customer_reviews.text: I have fair skin, dark blond hair, blue eyes, and this color looks really natural on me. I apply it twice a day; morning and after lunch, and it stays put all day. I will be buying more... it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ginabobeeena

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product!!! Came quickly in perfect condition! Love that this type of lip color doesn't prevent me from living a worry-free life unlike a gloss or traditional lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Benadette

customer_reviews.title: I like the natural look
customer_reviews.text: This gives just color with no texture. I like the natural look. It does need to be reapplied frequently.
customer_reviews.author: C J

customer_reviews.title: ... more red on me than I wanted but I love how easy it is to apply and it's not ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit more red on me than I wanted but I love how easy it is to apply and it's not a balm or lipstick
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awful. It doesn't go on evenly and doesn't last. You pay for what you get. Keep looking and spend more for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Too bad that there is no freshness date on these things
customer_reviews.text: Too bad that there is no freshness date on these things. The two that we received were virtually dried up when we got them.
customer_reviews.author: Russ in Elk Grove

customer_reviews.title: Good.... but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Little darker then I wanted but still a pretty color. It does last long but not as long as I hoped. The price for the quality is ok. It just seemed to be one star short on all points. Good product but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Drea K.

customer_reviews.title: Lasting Color
customer_reviews.text: I prefer lip stain to lipstick. I use this with a bit of lip balm over it.
customer_reviews.author: Eskay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color base for layering.
customer_reviews.text: Great color! True Pink. Wears well, but needs moisturizing gloss over it. Adds nice color base for layering pinks, berries, or reds. Stays on until you eat.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Liquid Lip Stains..stays on all day..just be sure it's dry before adding a gloss.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Shaver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i Love it.. and my Niece too .. it looks like natural lips... with a touch of color
customer_reviews.author: Lalis2c

customer_reviews.title: I like it but this one seemed as though it had ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used CoverGirl lipstain for several years. I like it but this one seemed as though it had dried out a bit...maybe old?
customer_reviews.author: colleen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a great pigment but it dries your lips out really fast.
customer_reviews.author: sarah mae richens

customer_reviews.title: Lip stain
customer_reviews.text: I really love these lip stains . I put it on in the morning then touch up with colored lipgloss during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color. Stays on until you eat. Easy to apply
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: COVERGIRL Outlast Lipstain Everbloom Kiss 400, .09 oz (packaging may vary)
product_meta.description:
Package Quantity:1The water-based colorants of Outlast Lipstain give lips a beautiful, lightweight flush of color that won't come off, lasting for hours without the heavy look or feel of an ordinary lipstick. Its pen-like precision applicator makes it easy to define your lips-just draw on color without any hassle!

BRAND STORY
By
